About Me

Let Me Tell You A Few Things About Myself...

BIO

Aditya Rawat is an experienced 13 year old middle schooler, web developer, and programmer. Driven by life's obstacles, he takes pride in providing you with the best portfolio website possible. As an 8th grader, his goals include building a full scale gaming PC and to be able to maintain absolute focus. In addition to his primary awesomeness, Aditya Rawat has been recognized by himself for his extraordinary commitment to finding the loopholes in everything.

Swimmer

Silver II At NOVAQUATICS

I began swimming at 6 years old. I was swimming in a seasonal league that would only compete in the summer. But later, I was compelled to join a club to further enhance my swimming skills, so at 11 years old, I joined NOVAQUATICS, a swim club. Right now I'm in the Silver II group.

Code Orange

FRC Team 3476

I began to participate in FRC Team 3476 in 2018, and we went to World Champs for the 7th consecutive time. I was on the CAD team and the manufacturing team, really creating the robot. This is my first year, so not a lot. But I'm constantly getting better at what I'm doing and doing other things.

Web Developer

Currently Unemployed

I began creating websites in 6th grade, starting off with template website creators, like Wix and Weebly. But later, over the summer I learned how to make my own website with HTML and CSS. I worked on a few and then made this one after forgetting for a long time. But now it works so, progress.
